# meraki_wireless_zigbee_door_lock (Data Source)

This data source can read the `Wireless Zigbee Door Lock` configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "meraki_wireless_zigbee_door_lock" "example" {
  organization_id = "123456"
  door_lock_id    = "1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `door_lock_id` (String) Door lock ID
- `organization_id` (String) Organization ID

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The id of the object
- `name` (String) Door lock name to update
